name: robot models
status: A living document of anthropomorphised toys.

robots.feature: Next-gen vision system: 2x frame rate, 1/4 latency, 60% wider FOV per camera; embedded palm cameras for <20ms grasp feedback; Helix AI for on-board reasoning.
Fully electric actuators with modular high-torque motors; embedded 3D vision for <30ms dynamic response; drops hydraulics for quieter, efficient control.
Swarm coordination via 5G-A low-latency networks; AI-driven locomotion/vision software for <40ms sync in multi-robot setups.
Google's Gemini Robotics AI integration for edge inference; low-latency joint torque feedback for heavy-lift tasks; 1M-token context for planning.
Vision-language-action models with <50ms end-to-end latency; frameless motors for precise, low-inertia grasping; battery runtime 4â€“8 hours.
Novel end-to-end neural network for continuous real-time adaptation and optimization of movements; shockingly realistic walking gait.
Robust bipedal gait adapting to varying surfaces and obstacles; engineered for speed and precision in warehouse tasks.
Bipedal design with low-latency teleop traces for skill learning; NVIDIA Isaac GR00T N1 for on-board autonomous execution.
High walking speed with modular upgrades; 3D LiDAR and depth cameras for sharp environmental awareness.
Targeting mass production with advanced bipedal mobility for healthcare and rehab tasks.
AI-powered for walking, object manipulation, and communication; flexible silicone skin for 12+ emotions; 6-hour battery with 77% Russian components.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: INT8 quantization, on-device fine-tuning; runs on single GPU/CPU.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Manipulation, voice interaction; fine-tuned for skill chaining in bipeds.
language models.notes_sources: Outperforms larger LLMs on edge; used in hybrid LLM-RL pipelines for adaptive grasping.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: Structured sparsity (2:4), KV-cache quantization; Minstrel framework for edge balance.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Navigation & planning; low-level control in unpredictable environments.
language models.notes_sources: Ideal for real-time RAG in robots; 100x cost reduction vs. GPT-4 for similar perf.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: MoE (Mixture-of-Experts) for sparse activation; on-device tool-calling.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Agentic coding for robot behaviors; multimodal (vision+text) for scene understanding.
language models.notes_sources: Local/offline for bipeds; excels in long-horizon tasks like tidying (e.g., NEO robot).

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: Speculative decoding + patch selection; optimized for embedded VLMs.
language models.robotic_use_cases: 3D perception & reasoning in autonomous driving/robots (e.g., LiteVLM pipeline).
language models.notes_sources: Open-weight; crushes math/reasoning benchmarks; low-power for battery-constrained bots.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: W4A16 weight-only quantization; TensorRT-LLM integration for edge.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Embodied navigation; multi-modal fusion for human-robot interaction.
language models.notes_sources: Massive context (10M tokens) for planning; deployed in Figure 03 for warehouse tasks.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: On-device distillation; Gemini Robotics AI for edge inference.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Voice-based locomotion; hybrid cloud-edge for Apollo/Optimus.
language models.notes_sources: Lightweight VLM variant; strong in video understanding for dynamic environments.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: Compressed for local runs; Octopus v2-style function calling.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Skill generation & teleop traces; low-latency in 1X NEO for chores.
language models.notes_sources: Open-source GPT analog; privacy-focused for offline robotic autonomy.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: 95% context reduction; speculative decoding for function calling.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Real-time behavior trees; LLM-BRAIn for fast robot planning.
language models.notes_sources: Surpasses GPT-4 latency on edge; ideal for agentic systems in bipeds like SE01.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: End-to-end VLM for driving; patch/token selection for camera feeds.
language models.robotic_use_cases: Autonomous navigation; interpretable actions in Walker S2 swarms.
language models.notes_sources: Robotics-specific; integrates with ROS for low-latency JSON action queries.

language models.key_optimizations_for_low_latency: TENNs algorithm for FPGA/low-power; Isaac platform optimizations.
language models.robotic_use_cases: On-board execution for manipulation; used in NEO Gamma for tidying.
language models.notes_sources: Hardware-accelerated; enables <50ms visuomotor loops in electric Atlas.
